languages.text: "Нельзя. Проклятье Вульфена — секрет нашего Ордена, а секреты должно хранить. Я не могу оставить здесь свидетельство нашей уязвимости, ведь враг может отыскать его и использовать".
"We cannot. The Curse of the Wulfen is a secret of our Chapter, and secrets must be kept. I cannot leave proof of our vulnerability here, for the enemy may find it and use it."
languages.original_text: "Нельзя. Проклятье Вульфена — секрет нашего Ордена, а секреты должно хранить. Я не могу оставить здесь свидетельство нашей уязвимости, ведь враг может отыскать его и использовать".

traits.locale_text: "We cannot. The Curse of the Wulfen is a secret of our order, and secrets must be kept. I cannot leave proof of our vulnerability here, for the enemy may find it and use it."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We cannot. The Curse of the Wulfen is a secret of our order, and secrets must be kept. I cannot leave proof of our vulnerability here, for the enemy may find it and use it."

traits.locale_text: "We cannot. The Curse of the Wulfen is a secret of our order, and secrets must be kept. I cannot leave proof of our vulnerability here, for the enemy may find it and use it."

traits.locale_text: "We cannot. The Curse of the Wulfen is a secret of our Chapter, and secrets must be kept. I cannot leave proof of our vulnerability here, for the enemy may find it and use it."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “不能这么做，狼人诅咒是我们战团的秘密。我们必须保守秘密，绝不能把弱点的证据留在这里，否则敌人可能会发现，加以利用。”
languages.original_text: "We cannot. The Curse of the Wulfen is a secret of our Chapter, and secrets must be kept. I cannot leave proof of our vulnerability here, for the enemy may find it and use it."

traits.locale_text: “不能这么做，狼人诅咒是太空野狼的秘密。我们必须保守秘密，绝不能把弱点的证据留在这里，否则敌人可能会发现，加以利用。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「それは無理だ。狂狼の呪いは戦団の機密と規定されていて、明かしてはならない。俺たちの弱点の証拠をここに残すわけにはいかない。敵に見つかって利用されたらたまったもんじゃないからな」
languages.original_text: "We cannot. The Curse of the Wulfen is a secret of our Chapter, and secrets must be kept. I cannot leave proof of our vulnerability here, for the enemy may find it and use it."

traits.locale_text: 「それは無理だ。狂狼の呪いは戦団の機密と規定されていて、明かしてはならない。俺たちの弱点の証拠をここに残すわけにはいかない。敵に見つかって利用されたらたまったもんじゃないからな」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «No podemos. La Maldición de los Wulfen es un secreto de nuestro Capítulo y los secretos están para guardarlos. No puedo dejar pruebas de nuestra vulnerabilidad aquí, donde el enemigo podría encontrarlas y usarlas».
languages.original_text: "We cannot. The Curse of the Wulfen is a secret of our Chapter, and secrets must be kept. I cannot leave proof of our vulnerability here, for the enemy may find it and use it."

traits.locale_text: «No podemos. La Maldición de los Wulfen es un secreto de nuestra orden y los secretos están para guardarlos. No puedo dejar pruebas de nuestra vulnerabilidad aquí, donde el enemigo podría encontrarlas y usarlas».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Impossible. La Malédiction du Wulfen est un secret de notre Chapitre qu'il nous faut préserver. Je ne peux pas laisser ici une preuve de notre vulnérabilité, au risque que l'ennemi la découvre et l'utilise contre nous. »
languages.original_text: "We cannot. The Curse of the Wulfen is a secret of our Chapter, and secrets must be kept. I cannot leave proof of our vulnerability here, for the enemy may find it and use it."

traits.locale_text: « Impossible. La Malédiction du Wulfen est un secret de notre ordre qu'il nous faut préserver. Je ne peux pas laisser ici une preuve de notre vulnérabilité, au risque que l'ennemi la découvre et l'utilise contre nous. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Das können wir nicht. Der Fluch des Wulfen ist ein Geheimnis unseres Ordens, und Geheimnisse müssen bewahrt werden. Ich kann keinen Beweis für unsere Verwundbarkeit hier zurücklassen, denn der Feind könnte ihn finden und gegen uns verwenden."
languages.original_text: "We cannot. The Curse of the Wulfen is a secret of our Chapter, and secrets must be kept. I cannot leave proof of our vulnerability here, for the enemy may find it and use it."

traits.locale_text: "Das können wir nicht. Der Fluch des Wulfen ist ein Geheimnis unseres Ordens, und Geheimnisse müssen bewahrt werden. Ich kann keinen Beweis für unsere Verwundbarkeit hier zurücklassen, denn der Feind könnte ihn finden und gegen uns verwenden."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Bırakamayız. Börü Laneti, Tümenimizin sırrıdır ve sırlar açık edilmemelidir. Zayıf noktamıza dair bir ipucunu burada bırakamam, düşmanlar bulup bundan yararlanabilir."
languages.original_text: "We cannot. The Curse of the Wulfen is a secret of our Chapter, and secrets must be kept. I cannot leave proof of our vulnerability here, for the enemy may find it and use it."

traits.locale_text: "Bırakamayız. Börü Laneti, Tümenimizin sırrıdır ve sırlar açık edilmemelidir. Zayıf noktamıza dair bir ipucunu burada bırakamam, düşmanlar bulup bundan yararlanabilir."
